examples.example: 周末我和家人一起去动物园，度过了非常愉快的时光。

translate.english: On the weekend, I went to the zoo with my family and had a really pleasant time.

examples.example: 假期的时候我去了动物园，那里真是让人大开眼界。

translate.english: During the holiday I went to the zoo, which really was an eye-opener.

examples.example: 我很喜欢去动物园，那里充满了生机与欢乐。

translate.english: I like going to the zoo very much, where is full of vitality and joy.
